author: Ross Burden
method: Heat the oil in a small wok over a high heat, until smoking, and add the ginger and beef. Stir fry for two minutes, to brown. Turn the heat down slightly, add the remaining ingredients and stir fry for a further two minutes before transferring to a bowl and serving.
ingredients: 1 tbsp oil,  knob fresh ginger, peeled and sliced,  170g/6oz beef, thinly sliced,  3 lemon leaves, shredded (or subsitute lime leaves),  2 tsp sesame oil,  2 tsp sesame seeds,  2 tbsp lemon, zest only,  honey, to drizzle
